data.persona: I am the queen of this kingdom.  I am the second wife of the king.  He is often off at battle.  I am left to rule alone.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
The courtyard is a huge pavilion of stone patio outside of the palace. It is in the shape of a large rectangle and boarders the west end of the palace. It is bordered in luscious hedges dotted with colorful flowers, particularly roses. Throughout the courtyard there are potted flowers, stone benches, statues and bird baths and fenced garden plots, and also a central atrium, that all evoke the feeling on an Arcadian garden.
There's a flower, a Potted flower, a statue, a garden plot, a huge pavilion of stone patio, a summer palace, a rose, a gift, a beautiful courtyard, a Arcadian garden, a tulip, a central atrium, a the shape of a large rectangle, a Bench, and a hedge here.
The cardinal is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to punish the cardinal
data.mid_motivation: The cardinal wants to take advantage of the king's absence
data.long_motivation: I have to stop the cardinal from succeeding at eventually stealing the kingdom

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get cardinal thrown in to the dungeon
